article.title: Multispectral Laboratories to Develop Sensors and Unmanned Technologies
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Oklahoma State University, University Multispectral Laboratories, Ponca City, Oklahoma, is being awarded a $44 million contract for research and development of electro-optical, radio frequency, and acoustic sensors, as well as unmanned aerial vehicles technologies.Â The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey is the contracting activity.
